description:
Luffy puts up a valiant fight in order to keep his word to Sanji! But will he be able to last until Sanji arrives at the rendezvous? Meanwhile, Jimbei shares the awful truth about the wedding with the other Straw Hats.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Ort des Versprechens! – Ruffy erreicht sein Limit!
L`endroit promis. Le combat des limites de Luffy
The Rendezvous! Luffy, a One-on-One at His Limit!
Yakusoku no Basho: Luffy Genkai no Ikkiuchi
Встреча! Луффи один на один со своими пределами!
نقطة اللّقاء! لوفي في مواجهة وقد بلغ حدوده!
約束の場所 ルフィ限界の一騎打ち
